articles.title: Google execs tell employees in testy all-hands meeting that Bard A.I. isn't just about search - CNBC
articles.description: After rolling out Bard as an AI service largely for search, Google executives appear to be pivoting away from that focus without providing specific use cases.
articles.content:
Sundar Pichai, chief executive officer of Google Inc., speaks during the Google I/O Developers Conference in Mountain View, California, U.S., on Tuesday, May 8, 2018.

articles.title: Destiny 2: Lightfall's Launch Has Fans Polarized Amid Negative Reviews - IGN
articles.description: Destiny 2: Lightfall's launch has polarized fans, earning negative reviews on Steam and elsewhere. Here's why.
articles.content: This weeks release of Destiny 2: Lightfall saw a massive influx of players on Steam and console to check out Bungies next expansion for its online shooter. As the penultimate story for its Light and … [+10537 chars]

articles.title: 3D modeling software Blender now has an official Stable Diffusion plug-in - The Verge
articles.description: Stability AI has released Stability for Blender, an official Stable Diffusion plug-in that introduces a suite of generative AI tools that can create textures, images, and animations to use in Blender’s free 3D modeling software.
articles.content:
